content.rendered:
Directed by Indra Kumar.

Written by Paritosh Painter. Ved Prakash. Bunty Rathore.

Cast Ajay Devgn(Guddu). Anil Kapoor(Avinash Patel). Madhuri Dixit(Bindu Patel). Riteish Deshmukh(Lallan). Arshad Warsi(Aditya). Jaaved Jaaferi(Manav (as Jaaved Jaafri)). Sanjay Mishra(Johnny). Boman Irani(Police Commissioner). Esha Gupta(Prachi). Pitobash(Jhingur (as Pitobash Tripathy)). Mahesh Manjrekar(Chinappa Swamy). Johny Lever(Raju (as Johnny Lever)). Vijay Patkar(Police Inspector). Mohammad Ali(Tamilian Jungleman (as Ali)). Manoj Pahwa(Pintoo). Sudesh Lehri(Altaf). Jackie Shroff(GPS Navigation (voice)). Sonakshi Sinha(Dancer in Mungda song). Karan Mehat(SkyDiving Plane’s Pilot). Ashwin Mushran(SkyDiving Team Leader). Sharad Vyas(Family Court Judge). Annapurna(Munmun). Niharica Raizada(Hot Girl in Car). Lokesh Mukta(Businessman in Hotel Room). Hitesh Rawal(Businessman in Hotel Room). Prerika Arora(Bindu’s Lawyer). Devang Rawal(Avinash’s Lawyer). Savita Sharma(Bindu’s Lawyer). Jehangir Karkaria(Fire Brigade Chief). Gurmeet Chawla(Man Trapped in Buliding). Amzad Khan(Man Trapped in Buliding). Hans Dev Sharma(Man Trapped in Buliding). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Sangeeta Ahir. Amar Butala. Ravinder Choudhary. Ajay Devgn. Hetvi Karia. Indra Kumar. Dilip Mistry. Anand Pandit. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Rajesh Shah. Ajay Sharma. Ashok Thakeria.

Production Ajay Devgn Films. Anand Pandit Motion Pictures. Fox STAR Studios.
